desc: Playing the game of poker is like playing the game of life — both are challenging without a guide or mentor to help you along the way. We’ve teamed up with poker & life legends like Danielle Striker, Tom McEvoy & T.J. Cloutier, who share their wisdom in the form of mantras. Poker Samadhi helps you play your best life.

layout.text: Designed to help you focus on your mantra, and help you win at poker and life.
